tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>*****ATTENTION*****</>

Check Events & Updates for Special Quest to Earn 50k or 100k Tokens!

 Use coupon code Twisted25 at www.twistedkittensgaming.com for 25% off all token purchases or subscriptions!

 Everyone who purchases tokens between now and the end of the month will be entered into a drawing to win Nitro in Discord!

<TextStyle.Orange>Before you embark on your Twisted adventure, we highly recommend you explore the tabs above to ensure you have a positive gameplay experience.  You can find things out like discord membership information, rules, rates and mods, and upcoming events! Please review each log in before you begin to ensure you are up to date on the latest news, updates, and events.  Rates will change from time to time and many adjustments and rules are based on community polling results.  Therefore, it is advisable to join the discord community to ensure your ideas, opinion, and voice are heard! Our goal is to provide a positive gameplay experience for all players.</> 

You can return to this screen at any time to check for updated information or reference at anytime on PC by pressing F1 or on PS5 by holding square to pull up the radial menu, move the left joystick to the icon that resembles a wolf and press R2, then while continuing to hold square move the left joystick up to the wolf icon again, then press R2 and you will return to this screen.

<TextStyle.Green>Oh! And one more thing! There are starter kits available free of charge through the webshop at www.twistedkittensgaming.com  Please view the Shop tab up above to learn about shop services. Have fun surviving!</>
tab1.text3:
Please visit www.twistedkittensgaming.com or join the discord at dsc.gg/twistedkittens for the most up to date list of mods, rates, and upcoming updates! 

 Connect your discord and player accounts to the website to use the shop and receive a token bonus! See https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/67145-Tkg-Webshop for detailed instructions on how to connect your account.

tab2.text1:
These are the current rules as agreed upon. Any suggestions are welcome and voted on!

RULES

TWO BASES PER TRIBE PER MAP

NO OFFLINE BREEDING

YOU MAY BUILD AS YOU WISH, AS LONG AS YOUR BASE IS NOT IN EXCESS, AND DOES NOT CAUSE EXCESSIVE LAG! IF A LARGE BUILD IS REQUIRED, PLEASE REQUEST AN INSPECTION BY AN ADMIN BY OPENING THE RADIAL MENU, GOING TO THE G LOGO THEN SELECTING REPORTS!

NO SPAMMING OF ANY STRUCTURES OF ANY TYPE. DISMANTLE TRAPS ONCE DONE TAMING.

NO EGG STEALING FROM OTHERS

NO HARASSMENT OF ANY KIND

BE CAREFUL WHO YOU TRUST, WE ARE NOT MEDIATORS OF YOUR TRIBAL QUARRELS

WE ARE NOT BABY SITTERS WE WILL NOT REPLACE YOUR LOST ITEMS OR TAMES. ARK IS A SURVIVAL GAME AT IT'S HEART, TRAGEDY AND LOSS ARE PART OF IT.

ADMIN REQUESTS WILL BE PROCESSED IN THE ORDER THEY ARE RECEIVED AND WHEN ADMINS CAN GET TO THEM. WE HAVE FAMILY AND JOBS OUTSIDE OF ARK AS WELL

ANY DINO LEFT ABANDONED ON OTHER'S BASES OR OB'S WILL BE WIPED WITHOUT WARNING

First Offense - Verbal Warning, 24hr Notice to Correct Posted in Discord

Second Offense - Violating structure, dino, or player will be wiped. Failure to respond to 24hr warning will count as the second offense.

Third Offense within 30 Days - Permanent Ban

PLEASE HELP US KEEP THE ORDER. PLEASE REPORT ANY VIOLATORS OF THESE RULES TO AN ADMIN! SUPPORTERS OF THIS CLUSTER WILL BE REWARDED GENEROUSLY.

tab2.text3:
Please visit www.twistedkittensgaming.com or join the discord at dsc.gg/twistedkittens for the most up to date list of mods, rates, and upcoming updates! 

This Weekend We Will be removing Pull It! and adding Cyber Structures QoL+.  Cyber Structures QoL+ offers pulling capabilities and some more QoL Structures. Next Poll for next update will be listed in discord soon!

tab3.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>UPCOMING ADMIN AUCTION!</>

 Auction area is built and ready to be visited on TWISTED WHISKERS ISLAND! Please look for TP Twisted Auction and check it out! You can find it on the beach near Red OB! Auction date will be posted and bids displayed in discord, please join to participate!

Don't have time to visit in game? Check out what will be there at https://youtu.be/ZbaUUJ_KGtE?si=PrwfogI6ObDEmW3v

Join discord to place bids!
tab3.text2:
<TextStyle.Violet>PERFORMANCE TIPS</>

 The following link is to an article on our website detailing a list of commands you can enter in order to improve performance on consoles and lower performance PCs.

https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/92130-commands-to-help-console-and-lower-speedperformance-pcs 

There are some settings that are automatically executed by our server as soon as you enter the server. The settings we automatically adjust when you enter are as follows... 

r.VolumetricFog 0 (Adjusts variable volume of fog in the atmosphere) 

r.VolumetricCloud 0 (Adjusts volume of realistic clouds in the atmosphere) 

r.Water.Singlelayer.Reflection 0 (Adjusts the amount of reflection off water surfaces) 

r.DynamicGlobalIlluminationMethod 2 (This impacts the global illumination quality) 

We have made these adjustments to assist those with poorer performing PCs and consoles have a smoother experience. 

You as a player can adjust these as well to return them to default settings if you prefer improved graphics over improved performance without impacting anyother players. 

However, you will need to run these commands each time you enter the server.  For more information see discord tech support channels</>
tab3.text3:
<TextStyle.Red>Quest Start:11/29</>

Post a screenshot on our discord or Facebook Page of a dead boss in the boss arena and get 50,000 shop tokens! Post a video clip of the kill and get 100,000 shop tokens

<TextStyle.Red>Quest Submit Posts By:12/31 @ 5PM EST</>

tab4.text1:
We do have admin services and donation rewards through our website. This is also where you will locate any benches you need to craft mod items.  Not all of these benches are directly available in game and must be purchased by your collection of tokens earned in game. You can simply visit www.twistedkittensgaming.com and place your order. To participate, join our discord server using this address ---> https://dsc.gg/twistedkittens, log in at www.twistedkittensgaming.com using your discord account. You can link your discord and player accounts. Please refer to the instructions in the tutorials on the discord server and the website under the NEWS Category.  Items purchased on the webshop will be delivered directly to you in the game! If you are not online, the system will hold your order for 7 days awaiting your arrival in game to deliver.  Please refer to our ToS located inside our Discord Server for more information. 

Player Shop Rules

All player shop owners must abide by discord and cluster rules. No exception. Violation of any will result in revoke of shop privileges. This includes registering your shop. Please refer to discord for more info 

No selling spayed or neutered dinos.

No selling builds

To participate in AdminShop, you must be a member of the discord and have reviewed the adminshop policies and code of conduct. Please refer to https://dsc.gg/TwistedKittens for more information about administrative services.
